context_bundle.summary: Debugging workflow for Windows MCP send_keys failures. Diagnose PowerShell SendKeys issues, AHK path problems, and window targeting failures.

onboarding.quick_start: Test sequence: 1) list_windows to verify target exists, 2) try send_keys, 3) if fails, create AHK script, 4) verify AHK path exists, 5) execute via PowerShell
common_patterns: list_windows - verify target window exists and get title
get_window_info 'title' - check window state and coordinates
Test AHK: write simple script, execute, verify MsgBox appears
File fallback: write message to C:\Temp\message.txt when all else fails
known_errors: send_keys fails with 'Tool execution failed' - no details
Window title mismatch between list_windows and actual activation
AHK path spaces require proper quoting in PowerShell
Minimized windows may not receive SendKeys properly
PowerShell CreateDelegate overload errors in complex enumeration
